menuItems.name: Abu's Special Karak

menuItems.name: Samavar

menuItems.name: Black Tea

menuItems.name: Mint Tea
menuItems.description: Cool, calming, and oh-so-fresh—like a breath of crisp morning air in every sip.

menuItems.name: Milk Tea
menuItems.description: Smooth, sweet, and satisfyingly creamy—comfort in a cup that feels like a warm hug.

menuItems.name: Green Tea
menuItems.description: Light, earthy, and full of zen—your go-to for a gentle boost and a moment of calm clarity.

menuItems.name: Black Coffee
